module.p: nochd appear, come into view/sight is an intransitive (non-durative) telic verb, with verbal noun nochdadh

Examples from Gairm –
Bha grunnan de ar luchd-leughaidh an dùil, nuair a nochd an àireamh mu dheireadh de Ghairm, gu robh sin a’ strì ri buidheann shònraichte, no duine sònraichte, a chur do ’n Phàrlamaid, agus bha wèireichean an telefon gu math teth, uair no dhà, an déidh dhuinn tighinn o ’n chlò. Thog iad ceàrr sinn. [...]
Some of our readers were expecting [thinking?], when the last issue of Gairm appeared, that that was arguing in favour of sending a particular group, or a particular person, to send to the Parliament, and the telephone wires were pretty hot, for an hour or two [once or twice?], after we came from the printers. They misunderstood us. [...] td. 9, ‘Air an Spiris’ past simple = perfective
